answers.a: It’s used as a flavor enhancer in savory processed foods such as soups and broths, sauces and gravies, snack foods and seasonings, instant noodles, ready meals, and some processed meats—often in reduced‑sodium products as an alternative to MSG. On labels it may appear as “calcium diglutamate” or E623.

answers.q: what is the e number of calcium diglutamate
